column2: "Hom mma nyimpa nyina mbrɛ hɔnho adze nhyɛ ɔman mu mpanyimfo tum ase: osiandɛ tum biara nnyi hɔ dɛ dza ofi Nyankopɔn
column3: na tum ahorow a wɔwɔ hɔ no Nyankopɔn na ɔhyehyɛe."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi obiara a otsia tum yi no
column4: na hɔn a wɔyɛ dɛm no benya afɔbu ama hɔnho."

column2: "Na hɔn a wodzi mpanyin no ho nnyɛ hu mma ndwuma pa
column3: na mbom ɔyɛ hu ma bɔn. Ana emmpɛ dɛ isuro tum no? Nna yɛ papa ɛ

column2: "osiandɛ wɔyɛ Nyankopɔn asomfo ma wo yieyɛ. Na sɛ eyɛ dza ɔyɛ bɔn a
column3: ɔno suro tum no: osiandɛ onnkitsa tum afona no kwa
column4: na ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn somfo nye werdzifo a ɔdze ebufuw ba nyia ɔyɛ bɔn do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi otwar dɛ hom brɛ homho adze
"Iyi ntsi so na hom yi tow; osiandɛ wɔyɛ Nyankopɔn asomfo a wɔhwɛ dɛm adze yi do."
"Dɛm ntsi hom ntua obiara ne ndzinoa mma no: hom nyi tow ahorow nyina mma nyia tow sɛ no
column3: hom mfa nsuro mma nyia suro sɛ no
column4: enyidzi mma nyia enyidzi sɛ no."

column2: "Mma hom nndze obiara kaw gyedɛ ɔdɔ a hom bɔdodɔ homho: na nyia ɔdɔ ne nyɛnko no oedzi mbra no do."

column7: anaa sɛ ahyɛdze biara ka ho a
column8: woesi ne nyina tam wɔ asɛm yi mu dɛ

column2: "Ɔdɔ nnyɛ ne nyɛnko bɔn biara: dɛm ntsi sɛ yɛdodɔ hɛnho a nna yeedzi mbra no nyina do."

column3: dɛ ber enya edu a yenyan fi hɛn nda mu: na afei na hɛn nkwagye abɛn kyɛn ahyɛse a yɛgyee dzii no."
adzekyee abɛn: dɛm ntsi hom mma yenyi sum mu ndwuma no ngu
column4: na yɛnhyɛ kan no akodze no."

column2: "Hom mma yɛnnantsew yie dɛ mbrɛ ɔfata kan no
"Na mbom hom mfa Ewuradze Jesus Kraest nyɛ akontar nhyɛ
column3: na mma hom mmfa hom adwen mma honam nhyɛ n'akɔndɔdze ma."
